title: Language Learning Design Using In-Workplace Customized Knowledge Recommendation Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning progression in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment. Learners are advanced professionals requiring job-linked language proficiency improvement

learning_goals: Learners can identify dynamically changing knowledge requirements based on work situations with 80% accuracy
Learners improve target language proficiency (reading/writing/speaking) by 20% per week using personalized learning content from a recommendation system
Learners rate the suitability of the knowledge recommendation system at 4 points or higher (out of 5) when performing work-related language tasks within three months

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
